items.content_html: MiniMeet is a lightweight, real-time video conferencing application built with modern web technologies. It enables users to create and join video meetings with features like video/audio controls, screen sharing, and real-time chat.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
